title: Day's End Lullaby
description: Karen Cioffi and Robyn Feltman’s bedtime picture book Day’s End Lullaby combines the sweetness of a parent’s soothing voice with lyrical phrases creating a nearly irresistible lure toward sleep. With the reminder that the sun has set and the beloved toys are awaiting tomorrow’s playtime, the rhythmic flow and loving message will give every child a sense of safe and timely slumber. As a special feature, the sheet music to this charming lullaby is included. Day's End Lullaby will be the perfect addition to every child's bedtime routine.
author: Robyn Feltman
